thread.title: Dr Stephen
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses Canada reviewed by Dr Stephen

author: Dr Stephen
title: Dr Stephen
text:
Maui Jim sunglasses are worth the extra $$, polarization makes a huge difference! The fact they make reader sunglasses is a bonus! Light, strong, durable, fashionable, perfect for sitting by the pool suntanning or out on the golf course. Adjustable nosepieces a must for me, easy to do. You won't be disappointed by them!
Delivery from Asia took a few days by Fedex, it was amazing how quickly they arrived!!!
